text: Bar-Hillel is a surname. Notable people with this name include: *Gili Bar- Hillel (born 1974), translator of Harry Potter into Hebrew, daughter of Maya *Maya Bar-Hillel (born 1943), Israeli psychologist, mother of Gili and daughter of Yehoshua *Yehoshua Bar-Hillel (1915–1975), Israeli philosopher, mathematician, and linguist, father of Maya
title: Bar-Hillel
